content: available through antiquepatternlibrary org pdf is for complete booklet lily design book #71 webpage 1 direct pdf 2 1 http //www antiquepatternlibrary org/html/warm/6-ta011 htm 2 http //www antiquepatternlibrary org/pub/pdf/6-ta011lily071 pdf ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **material ** * 1 skein lt pink and 2 skeins shaded pinks daisy mercerized crochet cotton size 20 or size 30 * no 12 steel hook for size 20 no 13 for size 30 doily is made by connecting crocheted roses that gradually go from small to large
